name: geckoboard

description.integration: Easily create shareable dashboards that make key business data, metrics and KPIs clear and easy-to-understand.

documentation: # Geckoboard Use the Geckoboard connector to perform various operations such as creating a custom widget, dataset widget and more. To do this, you'll need to create a new Geckoboard API application. You can find the detailed instructions to create an Geckoboard API application in the Geckoboard API documentation. #### Prerequisites To use the Geckoboard connector, you need to have an Geckoboard account. If you don't have one, you can create an Geckoboard account at geckoboard.com. #### Supported Authentication Methods - Api Key #### Basic Operations #### Dataset - List datasets - Create a dataset widget - Create a custom dataset widget

ai_description.integration: The Geckoboard activity allows you to create and manage shareable dashboards for visualizing key business data, metrics, and KPIs, and should be used when you need to present data in a clear and understandable format; it supports operations such as accessing custom APIs, listing datasets, retrieving specific datasets, and deleting datasets.
